resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76505</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76505</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>9c1b79f8-b120-402c-a5a0-70a3c1def199#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az emberi szív felépítése</string>
            <string language="en">Build of human's heart</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bau des Inneren des Menschen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Construction du coeur de l'humain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Configuração do coração do ser humano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Configurazione del cuore dell'essere umano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατασκευή της καρδιάς του ανθρώπου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura del corazón del ser humano</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az emberi szív felépítését szemléltető ábra részeinek azonosítása. A megfelelő ábrarészletek nevének elhelyezése "Fogd és vidd módszerrel" az ábra melletti négyszögekbe.</string>
            <string language="en">Identification of parts of the picture which demonstrates the build of human's heart.Putting the appropriate picture-parts to the boxes next to the picture with the "Hold and take" system.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">szív,  keringés,  vérkeringés,  </string>
            <string language="en">heart, circulation, blood circulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kennzeichen der Teile der Abbildung, die den Bau 
heart.Putting des Menschen die passenden Abbildung-Teile zu den 
Kästen nahe bei der Abbildung mit dem "Einfluß- und Nehmen" System 
zeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Identification des parties de l'image qui 
démontre la construction du heart.Putting de l'humain les 
image-parties appropriées dans les cadres à côté de l'image avec 
le système de "prise et de prise".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Identificação das partes do retrato que 
demonstra a configuração de heart.Putting do ser humano as 
retrato-peças apropriadas às caixas ao lado do retrato com da "o 
sistema preensão e da tomada".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Identificazione delle parti dell'immagine che 
dimostra la configurazione di heart.Putting dell'essere umano le 
immagine-parti adatte alle caselle vicino all'immagine con "il sistema
dell'introito e della stretta".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσδιορισμός των μερών της εικόνας που καταδεικνύει 
την κατασκευή της καρδιάς του ανθρώπου βάζοντας τα κατάλληλα 
εικόνα-μέρη στα κιβώτια δίπλα στην εικόνα με τη "λαβή και 
παίρνει" το σύστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Identificación de las partes del cuadro que 
demuestra la estructura de heart.Putting del ser humano las 
cuadro-partes apropiadas a los rectángulos al lado del cuadro con el 
sistema del "asimiento y de la toma".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Inneres, Zirkulation, Blutzirkulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">coeur, circulation, circulation de sang</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">coração, circulação, circulação do sangue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cuore, circolazione, circolazione di anima</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καρδιά, κυκλοφορία, κυκλοφορία αίματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">corazón, circulación, circulación de la sangre</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>76505</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=9c1b79f8-b120-402c-a5a0-70a3c1def199&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
"
